name: Ordeal of Princess Eris
description:
On the west end of the continent lies Belneria, a kingdom in decline. Its neighboring country to the east, Flosein, breaches their non-aggression pact by launching a surprise invasion. In the ensuing chaos, princess Eris manages to escape from the castle.

As she watches the castle burn, she make a vow to herself.
"I swear... I'll take back my beloved kingdom!"Features:
  • Classic RPG experience
  • Engaging story and plot
  • Explore a fantasy world
  • Turn based party battles
